entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Tests.Perf_DateTime.GetNow has regressed across multiple configurations #67932
  • Assertion at..., condition '<disabled>' Blazor Web assembly #67911
  • System.Tests.Perf_Enum.EnumToString has regressed across multiple configurations #67909
  • Crash of our NetCore 6 Application #67897
  • [Perf] Changes at 4/8/2022 8:59:46 PM #67916
  • Regressions due to Roslyn update #67914
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_Leipzig #67913
  • [tvOS] Failing System.Numerics.Vectors.Tests #67893
  • Getting the event Notification on Sql Server Disconnection in ADO.Net #67908
  • Ability to define the System.Text.Json attributes on implemented interfaces #67892
  • Parsing format string precision intends to validate for overflow but the check does not work #67891
  • jit.1 work item failing on mono #67888
  • EMSDK-.WasmNativeDefaultsTests work item failing #67887
  • System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexMatchTests.Match_InstanceMethods_DefaultTimeout_Throws failing on CoreCLR checked runs #67886
  • HashAlgorithmTest.ComputeHashAsync_SupportsCancellation() fails to throw OperationCanceledException #67880

Closed

  • Improve allocations in `ConfigurationBinder` #67566
    7.0.0
  • HttpClient crashes android app when trimmed #67402
    6.0.x
  • Multi-targeting logic in Source Generators in NuGet packages doesn't work transitively #60870
    7.0.0
  • AddNETStandardCompatErrorFileForPackaging should allow for libraries to add their own buildTransitive logic #63413
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/PGO/ProfileCastClassAndIsInst/ProfileCastClassAndIsInst_random2/ProfileCastClassAndIsInst_random2.sh #67631
    7.0.0
  • [Mono] Intrinsify API's of System.Numerics.Vector and new API's of System.Runtime.Intrinsics.{64, 128} on Arm64 #64072
    7.0.0
  • Missing CI validation for RHEL 7.2 Release #8843
    Future
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_Mariomkas #67915
  • System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamTests_MsQuicProvider.WriteAsync_LocalAbort_Throws failed with OperationCanceledException #67612
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer does not work with Dictionary<string, object> #67588
    7.0.0
  • Test failure DataContractSerializerTests.DCS_MyPersonSurrogate_Stress #67410
    7.0.0
  • !sos.eeheap shows all LoaderCodeHeap sizes as 0 #58067
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: System.IO.Tests.StreamReaderWithBufferedStream_Tests.ReadToEndAsync_WithCancellation #67730
  • [HTTP/3] Test failure ResponseCancellation_ServerReceivesCancellation #56194
    Future
  • Help: .Net 6 and emitting IL to call constructors and methods that have pointers as arguments #67844
  • The dynamic type created is thrown FileLoadException when using the GetCustomAttributes method #67802
  • [ARM64] Consider using LDAPR to implement volatile reads when instruction is available. #67374
    7.0.0
  • FreeBSD's Interop.Process.cs has an off-by-1000 error #67807
    7.0.0
  • Rolling build failure: LibraryImportGenerator.UnitTests.Diagnostics.StringMarshallingForwardingNotSupported_ReportsDiagnostic #67864
  • First chance exceptions and missing logging when a service isn't given a service name #62923
    7.0.0
  • TimeZoneInfo doesn`t support Europeans identifiers (EET CET WET) #67296
  • Add support of standard streams redirection in dbgshim #10077
    Future
  • Add some of Intel ISPC methods to System.Numerics.Vector? #35460
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Make Decimal constructor decimal.ToDecimal(ReadOnlySpan<byte> span) public #66171

PullRequests

Created

  • improve Tls12 detection on Windows7 #67935
    area-System.Net.Security, test-enhancement
  • Add single-file debugging fix to DBI #67934
    NO-MERGE, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [wasm] Bump chrome used for testing to `100.0.4896.88` #67933
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Minor fixes #67931
    area-Meta
  • Handle more scenarios for loop cloning #67930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add MemoryExtensions.CommonPrefixLength #67929
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #67928
    area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #67927
    area-Infrastructure
  • Mono - Add error on warnings #67926
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • Update VSCode library debugging documentation #67925
    documentation, community-contribution
  • Add CompilerFeatureRequiredAttribute #67924
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Expose ConditionalWeakTable.TryAdd #67923
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix Assembly reference in unloadability #67922
    area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • System.Diagnostics.Activity: Implement Enumerate* API #67920
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, community-contribution
  • Add support for storing method handle histograms in profiles #67919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add IL Emit support for MethodInfo.Invoke() #67917
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Add RegexFindOptimization for embedded strings #67907
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Disable System.Net.Security.Tests ClientAsyncAuthenticate_MismatchProtocols_Fails #67906
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Disable System.Net.Security.Tests.CertificateValidationRemoteServer.CertificateValidationRemoteServer_EndToEnd_Ok ok Windows 7 #67904
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Make BSWAP16 nodes normalize upper 16 bits #67903
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert Vector.Equals optimization #67202 #67902
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Handle parameterless ctors in structs in STJ's ReflectionEmitMemberAccessor #67901
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Make ReRegisterForFinalize GC test more robust #67896
    area-GC-coreclr
  • AddUserSecrets fails in environments without generic env var and OS special folders #67895
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • WIP: Use csel for conditional moves #67894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Skip SIP in walk_relocation #67889
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Implement Tar APIs #67883
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • avoid using TcpClient in FtpWebRequest #67881
    area-System.Net

Merged

  • Fix incorrect format string arguments #67464
    area-Host, codeql
  • Annotating Regex library for Native Aot apps #67841
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Rewrite line to avoid subtlety #67921
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [Mono] Fix uninitialized vtable bug #67746
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Only add placeholder pkg file if folder is empty #67647
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • ARM64 - Emitting `msub` instruction #66621
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1712914 #67874
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix exception thrown when MsQuicStream write direction is locally aborted or canceled #67753
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add timeout parameter to perf-job to allow passing to template #67764
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix Assembly.LoadFrom resolver #67890
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Fix error message for invalid assembly name #67882
  • Fix unsupported type detection when serializing polymorphic System.Type instances #67618
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • JIT: fix interaction of OSR and shadowed parameters #67884
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix sos.eeheap's LoaderCodeHeap sizes #67885
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix exception and enable event logging when service has no name #67827
    area-System.ServiceProcess
  • Adding missing SDK assets for Publish #67765
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Add ReplenishingRateLimiter and IdleDuration #67020
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Fix & => && typo in Uri #67900
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Reenable ResponseCancellation_ServerReceivesCancellation #67535
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [Mono] Fix warnings to enable W4 on Windows. #66710
    os-windows, area-Build-mono
  • Fix hanging of NamedPipeClientStream when connecting with infinite timeout #66877
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Run large file test on its own #67857
    area-System.IO
  • Faster IndexOf for arm64 #67811
    area-System.Memory
  • Stop passing StandardOptimizationData.mibc to crossgen2 multiple times for SPC #67458
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disabe regex timeout test #67898
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [arm64] Add RCPC ISA (8.3+) and use ldap for volatile reads #67384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Mark GCStressIncompatible and similar tests as out-of-proc #67876
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix off-by-1000 error reported in issue#67807 #67834
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Code fix to add DisableRuntimeMarshalling when required #67676
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Fix inadvertent logical AND #67875
    area-System.Speech
  • S.S.C.Cose: Add Stream-based signatures #67786
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Support ByRefLike types as Generic parameters #67783
    NO-MERGE, area-TypeSystem-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Move EventPipe thread buffer allocation outside of lock #67936
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on firefox #61776
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • perf: Don't build in the payload directory on helix #67792
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • ARM64 - Optimizing a % b operations part 2 #66407
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Single-file debugging support in DBI and createdump #67163
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Use SubtleCrypto API on browser DOM scenarios #65966
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • [PERF][MAUI] Add iOS Startup Scenario (Runtime side) #67670
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: Add Microseconds and Nanoseconds to TimeStamp, DateTime, DateTimeOffset, and TimeOnly #67666
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [LibraryImportGenerator] Add/use CustomTypeMarshaller implementations for string marshalling #67635
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator
  • Enable installation on Ubuntu 22.04 - add libssl3 dependency #67862
    Servicing-approved, area-Setup, 5.0.x
  • [iOS] Remove unnecessary newline from CI script #67861
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Detect truncated GZip streams #61768
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Add SubstitutionParser that uses XPath Navigator into NativeAOT #64671
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Retry publish crossgen as AOT (#65948) #67636
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add initial impl of PartitionedRateLimiter.Create #67677
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Add xarch `blsmsk` #66561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix in-process decoding of DateTime in EventSource #67557
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [wasm] Bundle net472 dependencies for MonoAOTCompiler task #67757
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 6.0.5
  • [release/6.0] [Mono] Fix uninitialized vtable bug #67759
    area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.5
  • Fixed error messages on collections indexing #67696
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • JIT: Refactor call argument representation #67238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • crossgen2: Add --imagebase option #65567
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix pal_assert.h when PAL_STDCPP_COMPAT defined #64631
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Initial SIMD support #67848
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Asynchronous opening of QuicStreams #67859
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Discard casts when storing normalize-on-load locals #66389
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [arm64] Accelerate HexConverter::EncodeToUtf16 #67192
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • JIT: Optimize range checks for X >> CNS and for short/byte indices #67141
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • HttpHeaders should not remove invalid values during validating access #67833
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Fix nullability warnings for NativeAOT CoreLib #65137
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr/debug and part of inc directory. #62886
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Managed implementation of NTLM for Android and tvOS #66879
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • JIT: fix bug where a gc struct is not zero initialized #67825
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
